[2025-06-09 02:20:29] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Action received
get_activity_details
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Fetching activity details for: 28 (Year: 2025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] User Campus: Lipa, Is Central: No
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Found PPAS form with ID: 28
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Gender Issue ID: 98
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Initial Gender Issue: Test
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[2025-06-09 02:32:46] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

[2025-06-09 04:42:01] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

[2025-06-09 04:42:01] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

[2025-06-09 06:04:42] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?)

[2025-06-24 04:54:09] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id

                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?)

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[2025-06-24 05:56:44] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)

[2025-06-25 03:32:40] Query: SELECT p.id, p.ps_attribution, p.gender_issue_id, g.gender_issue, g.id as gpb_id 
                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?

                 FROM ppas_forms p 
                 LEFT JOIN gpb_entries g ON g.id = p.gender_issue_id 
                    AND g.year = p.year 
                    AND (g.campus = p.campus OR g.campus IS NULL)
                 WHERE (p.id = ? OR p.activity = ?) 
                 AND p.year = ? 
                 AND p.campus = ?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
